protocols.Paper_title: Detection of Klebsiella pneumoniae Carbapenem Resistance Genes by qPCR: Choosing the Right Method for Total DNA Extraction
Methods: other:silica spin column kit-based DNA extraction (QIAamp Fast DNA Stool Mini kit; QS; includes wash steps and centrifugation per kit design)

protocols.Paper_title: Detection of Klebsiella pneumoniae Carbapenem Resistance Genes by qPCR: Choosing the Right Method for Total DNA Extraction
Methods: other:reverse-elution silica column kit-based extraction (EchoLUTION Buccal Swab DNA Kit; BE; includes wash steps and centrifugation per kit design)

protocols.Paper_title: Detection of Klebsiella pneumoniae Carbapenem Resistance Genes by qPCR: Choosing the Right Method for Total DNA Extraction
Methods: other:reverse-elution silica column kit-based extraction (EchoLUTION Viral RNA/DNA Swab Kit Plus; BV; includes wash steps and centrifugation per kit design)

protocols.Paper_title: Detection of Klebsiella pneumoniae Carbapenem Resistance Genes by qPCR: Choosing the Right Method for Total DNA Extraction
Methods: other:lysis-only extraction (QuickExtract Solution; QE; described as combination of chemical and thermal lysis) used directly as qPCR template; for spiked stool matrix, blaVIM-1 detection failed while other targets detected

protocols.Paper_title: Detection of Klebsiella pneumoniae Carbapenem Resistance Genes by qPCR: Choosing the Right Method for Total DNA Extraction
Methods: other:thermal lysis T (TL-T) used as template in qPCR for cultured samples; for spiked stool matrix, qPCR could not be performed due to sample viscosity after heat treatment

protocols.Paper_title: Detection of Klebsiella pneumoniae Carbapenem Resistance Genes by qPCR: Choosing the Right Method for Total DNA Extraction
Methods: other:thermal lysis P (TL-P) used directly as qPCR template; in spiked stool matrix, detection reported only for some targets with low copy numbers

protocols.Paper_title: Detection of Klebsiella pneumoniae Carbapenem Resistance Genes by qPCR: Choosing the Right Method for Total DNA Extraction
Methods: other:silica spin column DNA extraction with inhibitor-removal/clean-up column

protocols.Paper_title: Detection of Klebsiella pneumoniae Carbapenem Resistance Genes by qPCR: Choosing the Right Method for Total DNA Extraction
Methods: other:silica spin column DNA extraction (stool kit)

protocols.Paper_title: Detection of Klebsiella pneumoniae Carbapenem Resistance Genes by qPCR: Choosing the Right Method for Total DNA Extraction
Methods: other:reverse elution DNA extraction (purification matrix binds impurities while DNA passes through)

protocols.Paper_title: Detection of Klebsiella pneumoniae Carbapenem Resistance Genes by qPCR: Choosing the Right Method for Total DNA Extraction
Methods: other:reverse elution DNA extraction (purification matrix binds impurities while DNA passes through)

protocols.Paper_title: Detection of Klebsiella pneumoniae Carbapenem Resistance Genes by qPCR: Choosing the Right Method for Total DNA Extraction
Methods: other:thermal lysis used as template for qPCR (direct-lysis approach)

protocols.Paper_title: Detection of Klebsiella pneumoniae Carbapenem Resistance Genes by qPCR: Choosing the Right Method for Total DNA Extraction
Methods: other:thermal lysis used as template for qPCR (thermoblock); reported viscosity prevented qPCR use for stool matrix

protocols.Paper_title: Detection of Klebsiella pneumoniae Carbapenem Resistance Genes by qPCR: Choosing the Right Method for Total DNA Extraction
Methods: other:chemical + thermal lysis (Quick Extract Solution); not compatible for all targets in spiked stool (blaVIM-1 failure reported)

protocols.Paper_title: Detection of Klebsiella pneumoniae Carbapenem Resistance Genes by qPCR: Choosing the Right Method for Total DNA Extraction
Methods: other:No sample-preparation/DNA-extraction protocol described on the provided pages (these pages contain references and a publisher disclaimer only; Microorganisms 2024, 12, 1285, pp. 19–21 of 21).
